base.description: Base branch for calculating affected projects.

head.description: Head branch for calculating affected projects.

project.description: Only perform actions on specified project, if affected.

commit.description: Commit & push changes from builds back to origin.

test.description: Test all affected projects & variants that have successfully built images.

tag.description: Tag (with organization name) all affected projects & variants that have been successfully built & tested images.

push.description: Push images of all affected projects & variants that have been successfully built, tested, & tagged.
